basics.name: Stephen L Boettcher
basics.label: Front-End Developer
basics.res_summary: Experienced Front-End Developer with 10+ years of expertise in architecting solutions and creating responsive, accessible, and scalable web applications. Proficient in modern JavaScript frameworks, including Svelte and React, with a strong focus on delivering innovative, high-performance solutions through clean, efficient code and adherence to industry best practices. Demonstrated success in driving technical excellence, optimizing user experiences, and aligning development initiatives with strategic business objectives. Skilled at leading cross-functional teams, mentoring developers, and designing solutions that bridge the gap between technical and business requirements.
home_summary: Welcome, this is my attempt at a Portfolio site and it's ever changing as I continue to work on it.  It's built with Svelte, SASS and some Tailwind CSS and is hosted on Netlify.

I’m a seasoned front-end web developer with over 25 years of experience in the software industry. My journey in technology began with a strong foundation in C programming, where I worked on backup software for Windows, focusing on data movement and device control using SCSI interfaces. This early experience honed my problem-solving skills and attention to detail, which have been invaluable in my transition to web development.

Today, I specialize in front-end development, with deep expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Over the years, I've mastered modern frameworks like Svelte, Vue.js, React, and Angular, allowing me to craft dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. My background also includes experience in back-end development, particularly with PHP, Python, and Node.js, giving me a well-rounded skill set that bridges both the client and server sides of web development.
I’m always eager to take on new challenges, constantly seeking opportunities to expand my skills and stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving world of technology.

projects.name: Stepped Registration
projects.description: Developed an innovative registration system that reimagined the traditional form-filling experience as a conversational journey. This Single Page Application utilized a component-based architecture to guide users through a natural, step-by-step account creation process. The system transformed standard data collection into an engaging, dialogue-like interaction that enhanced user experience while gathering necessary registration information.
highlights: Architected a versatile component library initially focused on user registration that evolved into a comprehensive system for creating diverse stepped user experiences across multiple applications
Engineered a robust backend integration system that dynamically generates page layouts and component configurations through structured JSON data, enabling flexible content management
Transformed static JSON configurations into a dynamic system supporting personalized user experiences based on user segments, significantly improving engagement and conversion rates
Developed fully tested, reusable components with comprehensive unit tests using Mocha and Chai, ensuring reliability and maintainability across the system

projects.name: Realtime Ad Module System

images.alt: Lightbox with iframe adjusts to height

projects.description: Developed a sophisticated real-time ad delivery system that seamlessly integrates both third-party and internal advertisements without requiring page reloads. The system interfaces with Kevel (our internal ad server) to dynamically serve targeted content ranging from simple markup and images to complex interactive ads from providers like Rokt and AdsPostx. Built a robust architecture that efficiently queries the ad server and renders appropriate content within secure iframes, ensuring optimal performance and user experience while maintaining site stability.
highlights: Engineered a responsive iframe service that dynamically monitors ad content dimensions and communicates with the parent page to seamlessly adjust layouts, preventing content jumps and ensuring smooth user experience
Developed a comprehensive JavaScript tracking library that captures and reports critical ad metrics including viewability, engagement time, and click-through rates to optimize ad performance and ROI
Implemented an intelligent caching system that pre-loads upcoming ads to minimize latency and provide instant content transitions between ad displays

projects.name: GA Event Tracking Service
projects.description: Developed a robust Google Analytics Event Tracking Service that simplifies click event monitoring across web applications. The service utilizes a data attribute-based system to automatically detect and track user interactions, transforming specified HTML elements into trackable components. It seamlessly captures and transmits event data to Google Analytics, requiring minimal setup while providing comprehensive tracking capabilities. Built with modern tooling including Vite and Vitest, the service is thoroughly tested and optimized for easy integration into any JavaScript project.
highlights: Implemented an intelligent redirect delay system that ensures accurate event tracking by waiting for analytics data transmission before page navigation
Engineered a sophisticated first-click tracking mechanism to prevent duplicate event submissions and maintain data accuracy
Established an automated CI/CD pipeline for seamless package versioning and distribution through NPM, ensuring reliable and consistent updates
